foods.name: Ajiaco
foods.description: A delicious chicken broth with potatoes, corn and guascas, typical of Bogotá.

foods.name: Bandeja Paisa
foods.description: A typical dish from Antioquia that includes rice, beans, ground beef, pork rinds, ripe plantain, fried egg, arepa and avocado.

foods.name: Sancocho
foods.description: A traditional soup made with meat (beef, chicken or fish), yuca, plantain, potatoes and corn.

foods.name: Arepas
foods.description: Corn tortillas that can be filled or accompanied with cheese, butter, hogao or other ingredients.

foods.name: Empanadas
foods.description: Corn dough filled with meat, potato and other ingredients, fried until crispy.

foods.name: Patacones
foods.description: Fried green plantain that is flattened and fried again, ideal to accompany main dishes.

festivities.name: Carnival of Barranquilla
festivities.description: One of the largest festivals in Colombia, known for its parades, costumes and music.

festivities.name: Feria de Cali
festivities.description: An annual event that celebrates the culture caleña with salsa, concerts and sporting events.

festivities.name: Vallenato Festival
festivities.description: A festival dedicated to vallenato music, held every year in Valledupar.

festivities.name: Festival de Blancos y Negros
festivities.description: A festival that celebrates the cultural diversity of southern Colombia, especially in Pasto.

festivities.name: Feria de Manizales
festivities.description: A traditional fair that includes bullfights, parades and cultural events.

festivities.name: Ibero-American Theater Festival of Bogotá
festivities.description: A cultural event that brings together theatre companies from around the world.
